dcterms:creator: M. Abadi
A. Agarwal
P. Barham
E. Brevdo
Z. Chen
C. Citro
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each representing a single digit from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset where the network is presented with a one-dimensional time-series of T time-steps, aiming to approximate the first input after receiving the last.
dcterms:title: Copy first input benchmark

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset used to evaluate the ability of networks to exploit complex relationships between different elements of the input signal to predict the output.
dcterms:title: Denoising benchmark

dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset where MNIST images are presented pixel by pixel as a time-series, allowing the evaluation of RNNs on sequential data.
dcterms:title: Sequential MNIST
